    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public android.graphics.Bitmap transform(android.graphics.Bitmap source)
        Description copied from interface: com.squareup.picasso.Transformation
        Transform the source bitmap into a new bitmap. If you create a new bitmap instance, you must call Bitmap.recycle() on source. You may return the original if no transformation is required.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface com.squareup.picasso.Transformation

      • key

        public java.lang.String key()
        Description copied from interface: com.squareup.picasso.Transformation
        Returns a unique key for the transformation, used for caching purposes. If the transformation has parameters (e.g. size, scale factor, etc) then these should be part of the key.
        Specified by:
        key in interface com.squareup.picasso.Transformation
